body: Little biographical information is available for Lane; however, she is known for still life paintings, especially those including lemons. Her paintings have been sold through major auction houses and she is included in the âartist's Bluebookâ (Dunbier, 2005). This painting is reminiscent of her painting âStill Life with Bottles and Lemonsâ (1889); however, it is more finely executed with a hint more color.
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 23.75 x 37.75 inches / Signed lower left
